answers.author: Matthew Reges
answers.text:
Our regional library serves a city and four surrounding counties with population 200,000. Libary Director salary range $75,316 to $120,536.

answers.author: Christina Rivera
answers.text:
Sonoma County Library Director compensation is $150,820, plus an additional $39,829 in benefits. The Library system serves a 460,000 population county.

author: Richard Ferreira
text:
What is the average salary of a certified library director in a medium size city?
Thanks,
Richard A. Ferreira
title: Former City Councilman/Dep. Mayor
